description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Orders made to approve the acquisitions of immovable properties in Pannala Kotugodella, Uva Paranagama D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Ambagasdowa Water Supply Scheme and in Warapitiya, Rattota D/S Division, Matale District for the constructions of Warapitiya, Thambalapola Water Treatment Plant and Rajjamana Watta, Matale D/S Division, Matale District of Rajjammana Water Treatment Plant under Greater Matale Water Supply Scheme
